dict.string:
I have a big dream and objective in my life: Use my creativity and my abilities to make the difference in the world.
With this opportunity I will make friends, and we together will make the difference in the world!

3 things that I really love: iOS Development, Design and Entrepreneurship When I started the BEPiD the entrepreneurial side began to grow on me, and with iOS Development I found the perfect way to reconcile the design and mobile development.

With this app you can add tasks for every weeks so easily, and can see it, deactivate it and delete it.
You will be notified about the task every week.
This App was developed entirely in Swift and and is available on the App Store.

Did you found any problem in your city? Report it in Colaborê!
Show to the population and local governments about the problems in the city, such as holes in the street, waste and more.
It's easy and fast.
The app will be soon on the App Store.

Trips are all about sharing. You share cultures, lifestyles, and experiences.
With RoundTrip you can plan your trip easily and quickly.
RoundTrip, helping you plan, do, and share your unique experiences.
The app will be soon on the App Store.

This is a project developed in High School for final course assignment about IoT (Internet of Things).
SICCE (Sistema Inteligente de Controle de Consumo Elétrico) was developed aiming to digitize the whole process measurement and control of electric power, providing real-time data, such as consumption and billing, and still to be detailed the consumption per rooms.
All data are presented on the internet or an App for iOS, facilitating the reading for anyone, without necessarily have advanced knowledge about electricity.
All of these benefits also come accompanied with the benefit of the low cost of the equipment used to automate the process.
The hardware was done and working, used Arduino and sensors, just developing the App.

I am fluent in Swift, Objective-C, Java, JavaScript and SQL.
Work Experiences: Rotation Intern @SAP Labs Latin America I am working at SAP Labs Latin America, in Co-Innovation Lab, since March 2015.
IT Analyst @Cooling & Freezing Dec 2012 - Dec 2014
Fairs: SICCE @MEP In 2013, My team and I presented the project SICCE (Sistema Inteligente de Controle de Consumo Eletrico) at the MEP (Mostra das Escolas de Educação Profissional).
Augmented Reality @FEICCOM In 2009, with just 14 years, I went to FEICCOM (Feira de Idéias do Colégio Coração de Maria) to explain how augmented reality works and show some examples.

Student @ BEPiD - Porto Alegre I am student at Brazilian Education Program for iOS Development in PUCRS - Porto Alegre, Brazil.
Ungraduate Student @ Information Systems - Unisinos I am ungraduate student in Information Systems, I will be graduated in 2019, at Universidade Vale do Rio dos Sinos - São Leopoldo, Brazil.
Eletrical Technician @ ETE Frederico Guilherme Schmidt I am Eletrical technician, graduated in 2014, at Escola Ténica Estadual Frederico Guilherme Schmidt - São Leopoldo, Brazil.

I am Diego dos Santos, 19 years old, undergraduate student in Information Systems, borned in Porto Alegre, Brazil. I love to design user interfaces, to think how to improve and make it intuitive. I believe that dreams move the world, and then no matter what I do, I always think about how it can help someone to achieve his dream.
Keep in touch: santos.diegod@icloud.com
